name: Atomic Challenge
description:
*WARNING!* This game is highly addictive.

One of the best 2017 arcade, action and challenging games.

Your challenge:

You need to inject 20 atoms into the main reactor of your nuclear plant. 

Each atom will activate 2 nuclear modules.

Be careful that the atoms do NOT collide or it will create a massive explosion.

To win a level, you need to activate 40 nuclear modules.

The game has 4 different levels of complexity and 4 leaderboards. 

> Blue Atoms move horizontally.

> Orange Atoms move vertically.
